name: Space Globs
description:
The Game

SpaceGlobs is a retro arcade shooter, based off the popular game Space Invaders. There are 50 challenging levels, containing multiple intense bossfights. You can play solo or co-op with a friend. This is the first time we decided to upload one of our projects and we hope you will enjoy!

The Developer

Neo Entertainment is an indie game developer, consisting of two people. We like to make games in our spare time and it warms our hearts to see other people enjoying them as much as we do. Feedback is always welcome!
